name: Mithilya Raj
description: Mithilya is a senior at Dulles who has been with with the club for her entire high school career. She has extensive programming knowledge and has helped write robot code and has been running this very website since her freshman year. She manages meetings, messages, calendars, social media accounts, and public relations, as well as engineering portfolios for Dulles Robotics.

name: Izack Waczko
description: Izack is a senior who has shown exceptional brilliance in computer design and building robots from his first day as a freshman. He oversees the building of all robots to ensure function and safety. He also oversees part orders and our budget. He has been with the club for 4 years.

name: Grace Yu
description: Grace is a junior at Dulles and has been with the club for 3 years. She likes to CAD and 3d print but finds she spends more time complaining about the printer than printing. SHe loves to plan various events and socials for us throughout the year.

name: Charlie Nguyen
description: Charlie is a junior at Dulles and is an avid fan of designing and building robots. He owns a 3D printer abd loves to design and print mythical artifacts in his free time.

name: Nikita Hansen
description: Nikita is a senior at Dulles and this will be her second year with the Robotics team.  She has developed a great interest in electrical engineering and hopes it will enhance the teamâ€™s skill set. Currently, she plans the Dulles Robotics events, manages communications, and is looking to expand in other areas when possible.

name: Ritvik Mangire
description: Ritvik Mangire has assisted with robotics build teams and administration since his freshmen year. He has been a leader in all robotics competitions, regardless of if Dulles was hosting it. Ritvik assists with planning and running meets and tournaments.

name: Allen Jacob
description: Allen is a senior at Dulles Robotics in his third year at the club. He often finds himself assisting and delegating build tasks and continuously learns more about design and programming, aiming to fill any gaps in the team. He aspires for Dulles Robotics to succeed greatly in the 2024-2025 FTC season!

name: Natalie Lam
description: Nathan Lam is a junior at Dulles and has been with the club for 3 years. She currently helps manage the club's social media accounts and is learning how to manage this website.
